betterquesting:10.desc:8:
the §6SAG Mill§r, similar to it's simple variant, can do the same task but with the §aadvantage of plugging in §6Capacitors§a for the machine's efficiency and §6Grinding Balls§a to increase the rates of the outputs§r.

To craft one, you'll need an §6Industrial Machine Chassis§r, a §6Piston§r, 2 §6Dark Bimetal Gear§rs, 2 §6Dark Steel§rs and 3 §6Flints§r.
However, if you already have the §6Simple SAG Mill§r, you'd only need 2 Dark Steels, 2 Dark Bimetal Gears and 1 Industrial Machine Chassis.
